long_description: Ready for a new workout bag? The women's Haiku Sprint Duffel is specifically designed to fit inside a gym locker. It's got a hanging loop, shoe garage and a top strap that can hold a yoga mat. Ventilated compartment isolates gym shoes from the rest of your gear. Top strap holds a yoga mat or jacket parallel to the top zipper; strap tucks away if not needed. 1 exterior hidden-zip pocket; 2 exterior slip-in pockets. 2 interior elastic-trimmed pockets. Carry handles are wrapped for comfort; padded, adjustable shoulder strap is removable. Haiku Sprint Duffel is made from recycled material.
